definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to die (when one's predestined life span is up)

sentences.english: And Sara lived a hundred and twenty-seven years.
sentences.chinese: 撒辣一生的壽數是一百二十歲。

sentences.english: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature?
sentences.chinese: 你們那一個能用思慮，使壽數多加一刻呢。

sentences.english: People say that all the years after 70 are gifts from the gods.
sentences.chinese: 人們說70歲之後的壽數是上天恩賜的。

sentences.english: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit?
sentences.chinese: 你們那一個能用思慮，使壽數多加一刻呢。

sentences.english: I will add fifteen years to your life.
sentences.chinese: 我必加增你十五年的壽數。
